title: Day 1059
content:
Day 1059

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*dn4hjZkvcvzKhD3Jh4jUCA@2x.jpeg)

It's amazing how fast children grow up. Seems like yesterday my wife was giving birth in our Cambridge apartment and now my kid is begging me to read her one more book before we go to bed.

If you're on the fence you should have kids. I'm so glad I did. Simple as.

2/13/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
